#!/bin/bash
RD_URL="http://$RD_NODE_HOSTNAME:4440" RD_TOKEN="$RD_OPTION_RD_TOKEN" RD_APIVERSION="$RD_OPTION_RD_APIVERSION"
for aclName in $(curl -s -X "GET" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_TOKEN" "$RD_URL"/api/"$RD_APIVERSION"/system/acl/ | sed 's/name=/\nname=/g' | sed -r 's/.*name='"'"'(.*)'"'"'\/>.*/\1/g' | sed 's/<resource.*//g' | sed -r '/^\s*$/d'); do
curl -s -X "DELETE" -H "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_TOKEN" "$RD_URL"/api/"$RD_APIVERSION"/system/acl/"$aclName"
done

#!/bin/bash
RD_URL="http://$RD_NODE_HOSTNAME:4440" RD_TOKEN="$RD_OPTION_RD_TOKEN" RD_APIVERSION="$RD_OPTION_RD_APIVERSION"
for projectName in $(curl -s -X "GET" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_TOKEN" "$RD_URL"/api/"$RD_APIVERSION"/projects | grep "name>project-" | sed -r 's/.*<name>(.*)<\/name>.*/\1/g'); do
curl -s -X "DELETE" -H "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_TOKEN" "$RD_URL"/api/"$RD_APIVERSION"/project/"$projectName"
done
